[b][color=white]Mosaic Background[/color][/b]
Mosaic background got added from the old Modern Theme. Go ahead and check the change. Also, share your opinion on the current revision. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5929496]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Scratch Card Game[/color][/b]
After a lot of discussions and suggestions [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] has recently added a [url=https://hackforums.net/scratchcard.php]Scratch Card Game[/url] where you can buy cards for 1000 β, and then scratch them for the following 6 prizes:
100k β
50k β
25k β
10k β
5k β
1k β. 
The winning ratio has been amended a little by compensating the odds. Besides, this might be useful for deals, contests, or giveaways in the future. Users can also transfer their cards to other members. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5931881]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1034038][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/sciencenews-saltpeter.png[/img][/url][/align]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium]

[b][color=white]American Biases are Evolving[/color][/b] 
Research conducted by Harvard finds that the bias of American citizens is slowly shifting away from sexual orientation and race. Those are being replaced with the overweight. These are the unspoken biases that many of us may not even be aware of possessing, and are most likely not even intentional. The head of the team said that they compiled data from the last twenty years to draw this interesting conclusion. This study goes to show just how long it can take to even slightly alter the court of public opinion, and will forever be a subject that intrigues me. I heavily encourage you to take a look at the originating study if any of the above sociological phenomena intrigue you. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.wbur.org/commonhealth/2019/01/11/implicit-bias-gay-black-weight]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Exercise Related Hormones and Alzheimer's [/color][/b]
Researchers have been saying that keeping active has been one way to help deter Alzheimer's for a long as I can remember. However, they are now attempting to put a name to that recommendation. Irisin, one of the main hormones released during physical activity, is what they have narrowed their sights on. In preliminary tests, patients with lower levels of Irisin in their bloodstream had a much greater risk of developing the crippling disease. Researchers are moving quickly on this possibly fruitful lead, with testing on mice being heavily studied. Results of these tests have been favorable so far, but we will need to wait and see how the study concludes. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.newscientist.com/article/2189845-a-hormone-released-during-exercise-might-protect-against-alzheimers/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

    
[/size][/font]
[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2295175][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/technews-stratify.png[/img][/url][/align]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium]

[b][color=white]UK's Online Porn Block to come early 2019[/color][/b] 
Since 2015, the United Kingdom government has been trying to impose a restriction on all pornographic sites to under 18 users of the internet. By doing this, their plan is to require any pornographic sites to provide proof that the user is over 18 in order to access the site. This was originally supposed to be introduced in the "Digital Economy Act" in 2018; however, the government has now put a full plan in place to get the age verification checks rolled out by April 2019. The age verification system a website uses can be picked by the website owner, and these include online ID document checks, digital ID apps or face-to-face verification by buying a "card" from shops around the UK. Many internet users are horrified about this new change, and not only the ones under 18. The use of ID documents being shared online spurts controversy over the privacy of the user and how their private details would be vulnerable to hackers if the systems put in place were to be hacked. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/home-news/porn-site-age-verification-uk-pornhub-sex-online-adult-video-government-id-a8631886.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Energy Usage due to Bitcoin may "kill the planet"[/color][/b] 
Bitcoin, the popular digital cryptocurrency is celebrating its 10th birthday. A new paper published in the journal "Nature Climate Change," suggests that if Bitcoin is adapted at a similar pace that other technologies have been adopted, then it could result in using more energy than anything else in the world. Large Bitcoin factories in China have been blamed for global warming increases, and it is said that Bitcoin mining alone could drive the Earth up by two degrees Celsius within the next 15 years. Mining one Bitcoin "could take as much energy to power your whole house for months," and therefore it is just not sustainable for the future. This two-degree increase can have catastrophic consequences for the Earth if no changes are made to stop this massive consumption of energy by large Bitcoin mining facilities.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.forbes.com/sites/andreamorris/2018/10/29/bitcoin-predicted-to-be-the-nail-in-the-coffin-of-climate-change/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

       
[/size][/font]
[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3601559][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/animenews-nightmare.png[/img][/url][/align]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium]

[b][color=white]One Piece Creator says The end is Near, But Series will be Just Over 100 Volumes[/color][/b]
The Creator of One Piece, recently appeared on Fuji TV, and announced the series is reaching its end. Eiichiro Oda, Creator of One Piece states the series will have "just over 100 volumes." This statement has caused an uproar in the Anime Community. Considering the series is currently at its 89th volume, fans are afraid that it'll end sooner than they think. Oda goes on to say he's been planning out the ending since his college years. After being asked if the end treasure would be "Family Bonds"  Oda replied with "No, I hate that kind of thing. That's like the ending of The Wizard of Oz, which I watched when I was a kid. Adventuring that long, and having the adventure itself be the treasure, is really dissatisfying. Those kinds of stories are impossible. It feels like, 'I've gone on this long adventure, so give me the treasure!" which to many fans is very relieving to hear.Greg Werner from V Jump stepped into the commotion to remind everyone that "When Oda gives you a percentage of the story complete you must never...ever...equate that to a calculable period of time." giving many fans Hope for more time with their beloved Straw Hat Crew.E[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/interest/2019-01-10/one-piece-creator-the-end-is-near-but-series-will-be-just-over-100-volumes/.141858] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Dragon Ball Super: Broly Film to be the 1st Anime Screened in IMAX in the U.S.A.[/color][/b]
This past Wednesday, FUNimation Entertainment announced Dragon Ball Super: Broly the anime film will get an IMAX Screening. This will make history on January 16th, as it will be the very first anime film to screen in IMAX in the U.S.A. The Film premiered it's English Dub at the TCL Chinese Theater in Hollywood back on December 13th. The film originally opened in Japan, on December 14th, earning more than 1,050,000,000 yen which is 9.26 million in USD. The film will be available in the United States and Canada on January 16th.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/daily-briefs/2019-01-09/dragon-ball-super-broly-film-is-1st-anime-to-screen-in-imax-in-u.s/.141819] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Hunter X Hunter: The Last Mission to be Screened by Viz Media in U.S. Theaters on January 30[/color][/b]
Viz Media and CineLife Entertainment announced this past Tuesday that they would begin screenings of Hunter x Hunter - The Last Mission the film. Screenings will begin on January 30th, in both English Dubbing and English Subtitles. This is a big step forward for Hunter x Hunter, and it's fan base. Viz Media's last Hunter x Hunter license was with the Hunter x Hunter: Phantom Rouge anime film, back on February 13th. The Film originally opened in Japan in December of 2013. Tickets will be sold on CineLife Entertainments website. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2019-01-08/viz-media-to-screen-hunter-x-hunter-the-last-mission-anime-film-in-u.s-theaters-on-january-30/.141780]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

   [/size][/font]
posts.subject: RE: Hack Forums News // Edition 424

posts.message:
[align=center][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/3.png[/img][/align]


[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1705027][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/darkops-business.png[/img][/url][/align]


[align=center][color=#95a7c4][size=small]TOPIC:[/size] [i][size=large]Is there any content or idea you would like to see a group come out with? What makes a group desirable?[/size][/i][/color][/align]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"I’d like to see a bit more ethical hacking groups, HF has strayed away from blackhat activity which I think is for the better. But I would like to see HF adapt and move towards something more ethical."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888]Anonymous[/color][/i]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"content wise I think that's very dependent on what the group is mainly focused around, with HF's current groups I would love to see some HQ thread's based around something money related Such as E-com etc also I think I would love to see something that can encourage engagement throughout the whole forum something that creates a lot of excitement. 

Being a part of Infamous I have truly seen the upside to groups there knowledge, Passion and friendship created within groups is amazing and you create amazing friendships with people who may have never potentially spoken to beforehand. I have been in other groups previously and I left them due some being very annoying and unproductive but i definitely know now what a real group is about and I'm so excited to see what infamous do with 2019 ahead of them."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3446221][color=#95a7c4]Banter.[/color][/url][/color][/i]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"I would like to see groups organizing site-wide events such as gaming/gambling tournaments or create fun social experiments that can include everyone. Groups that are desirable to me are ones that focus not on themselves, but the forum as a whole."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=659087][color=#95a7c4]Kill Joy[/color][/url][/color][/i]

      
[/size][/font]
[align=center][color=#95a7c4][size=small]TOPIC:[/size] [i][size=large]If you could switch lives/bodies with one HF member for a week, who would it be and why?[/size][/i][/color][/align]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"I’d probably switch with Vitani, as I bug him quite often about extreme violations. It would allow me to get a good grasp on what the staff members deal with on a daily basis."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888]Anonymous[/color][/i]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"Hard question but for me, I would have to pick Xerotic his work ethic and drive and passion is amazing even speaking to him makes me feel more motivated to do better and push harder. I think his mind works in Weird but brilliant ways and how he approaches things is interesting also his coding skills are amazing I would 100% love to have an insight to how he creates such amazing stuff! that aside he is a very down to earth person and easy to speak to and handles himself very well under pressure."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3446221][color=#95a7c4]Banter.[/color][/url][/color][/i]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"Literally no one. Who knows how clean or disgusting they are behind that screen."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=659087][color=#95a7c4]Kill Joy[/color][/url][/color][/i]
      
[/size][/font]
[align=center][color=#95a7c4][size=small]TOPIC:[/size] [i][size=large]Do you plan to remain active on HF for a long time? Why or why not?[/size][/i][/color][/align]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"I’m most likely going to stick around HF for a while as I’ve made a lot of decent contacts and would love to eventually share something new with the other members that use this forum."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888]Anonymous[/color][/i]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"Yes, the forum is more than a page with writing to me I have made friends here and build incredible relationships with people, seeing the progress and updates rolling out so quick on hack forums is amazing it speaks for itself Hack forums is growing in number's and I can see it becoming a lot bigger in 2019 and I for sure will be along for the ride."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3446221][color=#95a7c4]Banter.[/color][/url][/color][/i]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"Yes, I plan on being active until the forum or myself no longer exist. Even though I no longer do what I originally signed up to learn on this forum, there are always people looking for help and the odds are that you will be able to make a difference in one person's life just by helping. That to me is worth sticking around."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=659087][color=#95a7c4]Kill Joy[/color][/url][/color][/i]
      
[/size][/font]
[align=center][color=#888888][i][size=x-large]Let us know what your opinion is, uncensored. [url=https://hfnt.typeform.com/to/dHd2NV]Begin here.[/url][/size][/i][/color][/align]
